title: Video Conferencing
description: Allows users to conduct live video conferences for group study sessions.

title: Screen Sharing
description: Enables users to share their screens during study sessions for collaborative learning.

title: Chat
description: Provides a chat feature for users to communicate in real-time during study sessions.

title: File Sharing
description: Allows users to share study materials, documents, and files with each other.

title: Whiteboard
description: Offers a virtual whiteboard for drawing, writing, and illustrating concepts during study sessions.

title: Polls and Surveys
description: Enables users to create polls and surveys to gather feedback or gauge understanding.

title: Calendar and Scheduling
description: Allows users to schedule study sessions, set reminders, and manage study group calendars.

title: Breakout Rooms
description: Facilitates splitting larger study groups into smaller breakout rooms for focused discussions.

title: Note Taking
description: Provides tools for users to take notes, highlight key points, and annotate study materials.

title: Progress Tracking
description: Tracks individual and group progress, including attendance, participation, and completion of tasks.
